course_title: Special Topics in Indigenous Land-based Studies - INDIG L-BSD STS

sections.comments: This section is offered as part of the Dechinta Certificate in Land Based Research and is not open for registration. Visit dechinta.ca for more information.

description: Topics and location will vary from year to year. Experiential, intensive land-based course designed and delivered in collaboration with academic faculty and Indigenous community partner(s). For further information, email inlb.arts@ubc.ca.
